resources.string: This is an application that allows you to play a math game, currently only addition. The user can choose between 5, 10 and 15 tasks per round, which is selected in the preferences The app is designed to be as clear as possible and user-friendly. Therefore, the text in the application is large in size, and is only used where necessary. The format is also easy to understand, and with good contrasts so that the application feels as nice and user-friendly as possible. The application supports the languages Norwegian, German and English.
If you quit now, you will lose your progress in this round.
